amendment.description: An amendment numbered 112 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce the salary of Christopher Williamson, Assistant Secretary of the Mine Safety and Health Administration, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 280, 1 Present (Roll no. 667).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A055) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 280, 1 Present (Roll no. 667).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
